sentences.sentence: In the big sky at night, countless stars shine like tiny lights against the dark backdrop of space.
Far away galaxies spin in pretty, twisting shapes, their stars shining brightly.
The light travels a very long way to reach us here on Earth.
Our own planet, a bright blue ball, is full of life in a universe that otherwise seems quiet.
The mix of the big universe and the small world on Earth shows the amazing details and beauty of life.
As we learn more about the universe, we understand more about not just the world around us, but also about ourselves.
